title: Michael Smith gloats about his Bengals pick, previews the Super Bowl
description:
Bomani Jones welcomes back Michael Smith of Peacock's "Brother From Another" to gloat about his Bengals pick over the Chiefs in the AFC Championship and to preview the Super Bowl (1:35). They touch on whether or not Matthew Stafford of the Rams is a "system QB" (15:04) and whether or not 49ers QB Jimmy Garoppolo will have much trade value this offseason (37:47). Plus, why the timing of the NBA's trade deadline is so odd and what to make of the situations LeBron James and Kevin Durant have found themselves in with the Lakers and Nets respectively (44:09).
